mean_cn: n. 前提；房屋地基；  v. 假定
mean_en: a statement or an idea that forms the basis for a reasonable line of argument
sentence: This is the movie's premise: two people are trapped on an island and they end up falling in love!
sentence_trans: 在电影的前情假定中，两个被困在荒岛上的人迟早要相爱！
word_etyma: pre预先 + mise送，放出 → 预先送出 → premise前提
